channel.title: Kristin Berry: GIS Portfolio Page on Kristin Berry's GIS Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Kristin Berry: GIS Portfolio Page on Kristin Berry's GIS Portfolio

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Kristin Berry, a scientific software professional with some experience in GIS. I’m worked on projects ranging from small websites created to customer specifications to large image-processing software systesm with 15+ years of active development, and have an academic background in Physics and Earth, Atmospheric, and Plantary Sciences. I always enjoy learning new things and am always interested in new connections and oppurtunities. This site showcases primarily GIS projects created as part of the UWF GIS Certificate Program.

item.title: Contact
item.description: You can contact me by using the form below. Your Name Email Address An email address is required. Message

item.title: Portfolio
item.description: Here is a a sampling of my GIS work: Ward 7 Schools, Washington DC This map shows the schools in Ward 7 of Washington DC. Elementary, middle, and high schools are indicated by symbols of different size. The main feature of the map - Ward 7 - is a lighter color than the background of the rest of DC to create good figure/ground contrast. Map of Marathon, FL Map of Marathon, Florida created by me using Adobe Illustrator, and the ArcGIS extension for Adobe Illustrator.
